Key Match Events: The Lakers shot 45.7% from beyond the arc in this game.
The Sixers went nearly four minutes in one stretch without a basket in the third quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: The Sixers would continue their run at the bottom of the NBA Standings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jared McCain led the team in scoring with 18 points and also scored along with other bench units.
The Sixers drafted Jared McCain, who has proven himself to a degree early this season.
